reports.title: Short/Hedge Opportunities Research Report
reports.description: Comprehensive analysis of 6 potential short candidates with market caps >$5B, focusing on companies vulnerable to accounting issues, AI disruption, and extreme valuations. Includes detailed financial metrics, bear thesis, and catalyst timelines.
reports.summary: Research identifies 6 high-risk companies including Palantir (P/E 378x), Tesla (accounting red flags), and software companies facing AI disruption. Total addressable shorting universe represents >$2T in market cap with multiple catalyst events expected in Q1 2026.
reports.author: Subagent Research

reports.title: CVX (Chevron Corporation) Deep Dive Analysis
reports.description: Comprehensive deep dive on Chevron Corporation covering the Hess acquisition, Guyana growth catalyst, Q4 2025 results, oil price outlook, and investment thesis with full financial analysis.
reports.summary: Chevron is a high-quality integrated energy major with strong Guyana growth via the $53B Hess acquisition. Trading near 52-week highs with 3.94% dividend yield. Rating: HOLD/Accumulate on weakness below $165. Oil price headwinds ($56/bbl forecast) pressure near-term but long-term thesis intact.
reports.author: Subagent Research

reports.title: URA (Global X Uranium ETF) Deep Dive Analysis
reports.description: Comprehensive deep dive on Global X Uranium ETF covering nuclear renaissance, AI data center power demands, uranium supply-demand fundamentals, and SMR deployment catalysts.
reports.summary: URA provides diversified exposure to uranium mining at critical inflection point. ETF up 54% from 2025 lows on AI power demand, policy support, and uranium supply tightening. Rating: BUY with $62-68 target driven by structural supply deficit and nuclear renaissance.
reports.author: Subagent Research
